thread.title: Growth Bounces Back for Year at China’s Largest Banks

author: wsjcom
title: Growth Bounces Back for Year at China’s Largest Banks
text:
BEIJING—China’s largest banks saw profits rebound last year, boosted by higher interest rates, a strengthening economy and a Beijing campaign to rein in risky lending.
The brighter results are a relief from several tough years when the economy flagged, borrowers struggled to repay loans and a series of benchmark interest-rate cuts ate into banks’ profits. Those trends reversed and are now feeding through to the bottom lines of the biggest banks.
